summary:

title: Ignis mission: Ready for Lift-Off
summary: ESA project astronaut Sławosz Uznański-Wiśniewski is heading to the International Space Station on his first mission as part of Axiom Mission 4 (Ax-4). He is the second ESA project astronaut from a new generation of Europeans to fly on a commercial human spaceflight mission with Axiom Space.

title: Starliner future plans still in limbo
summary:

title: Live coverage: SpaceX to launch 26 Starlink satellites on Falcon 9 rocket from Vandenberg SFB
summary: The mission, dubbed Starlink 15-8, will be SpaceX’s 70th Falcon 9 launch of the year. It’s targeting a liftoff from pad 4 East at 6:34 a.m. PDT (9:34 a.m. EDT, 1334 UTC).

title: Further delays of Starliner’s next flight mark anniversary of its first crewed Space Station docking
summary: NASA said the next launch of the Boeing crew vehicle is now targeting no earlier than early 2026. However, that hinges on testing campaign set to take place at the White Sands Test Facility in New Mexico.
